td.content: s:patient says she is having symptoms of mild difficulty seeing similarities and differences in letters and words 4-5 times a week, in spite of treatment. she is a f aged 54 ys. o:Height 61 in, Weight 158 lbs, Temperature 99.1 F, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17 a:Dyslexia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed METHYLIN - 2.5 mg 2 x daily (max. 54 mg/day), and ordered Hearing Test.

td.content: s:F aged 55 Ys reports Kidney from time to time. denies any smoking Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol o:Height 61 in, Weight 159 lbs, Temperature 99.2 F, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17, Basic Metabolic Panel Creatinine=7.9 mg/dL,BUN=125 mg/dl,K= 6.4 meq/L,GFR=20 mL/min, Urinalysis protein=100 mg/dL, Arterial Blood Gas 6.0,PaCO2=30 mmHg,HCO3=27 meq/L a:Chronic Renal Failure p:administered Irbesartan - 150 mg daily, performed Basic Metabolic Panel, Urinalysis, Arterial Blood Gas, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

td.content: s:a f investment banker aged 55 yrs C/O mild difficulty seeing similarities and differences in letters and words, mild difficulty in school and mild difficulty with reading and writing.
